name: Omnitron
description:
Break into your father's lab and mess with his creations. Reprogram OMNITRON your way to unleash destruction upon the city.

Gameplay:

Browse through you father's stolen library books to pick and choose how to reprogram OMNITRON before it launches.

Features:

Scan science textbooks into OMNITRON to reprogram it.

OMNITRON requires prerequisite knowledge to understand a book.

Books, books and more books.

Multiple endings.

Winner of the Philosophy Award in EPIC MegaJam 2015
